Massacre.name: Massacre
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 15%.

Remorseless Attacks.name: Remorseless Attacks
descriptions: After dealing the killing blow to an opponent, gives you a 25% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, Mutilate, Hemorrhage, or Ghostly Strike.
After dealing the killing blow to an opponent, gives you a 50% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, Mutilate, Hemorrhage, or Ghostly Strike.

Malice.name: Malice
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance by 5%.

Ruthlessness.name: Ruthlessness
descriptions: Gives your finishing moves a 20% chance to add a combo point to your target.
Gives your finishing moves a 40% chance to add a combo point to your target.
Gives your finishing moves a 60% chance to add a combo point to your target.

Murder.name: Murder
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit while using your Sap, Ambush, Garrote, Expose Armor, or Cheap Shot abilities by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit while using your Sap, Ambush, Garrote, Expose Armor, or Cheap Shot abilities by 6%.

Hack and Slash.name: Hack and Slash
descriptions: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by 33%.
Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by 66%.
Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by 100%.

Relentless Strikes.name: Relentless Strikes
descriptions: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

Debilitate.name: Debilitate
descriptions: Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by 25%, increases the duration by 50%, and reduces the cost by 5.
Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by 50%, increases the duration by 100%, and reduces the cost by 10.

Lethality.name: Lethality
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, and Hemorrhage abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, and Hemorrhage abilities by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, and Hemorrhage abilities by 30%.

Organ Harvest.name: Organ Harvest
descriptions: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 3% damage from all sources.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 6% damage from all sources.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 9% damage from all sources.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 12% damage from all sources.
While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 15% damage from all sources.

Vile Poisons.name: Vile Poisons
descriptions: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 4% and gives your poisons an additional 8% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 8% and gives your poisons an additional 16% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 12% and gives your poisons an additional 24% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 16% and gives your poisons an additional 32% chance to resist dispel effects.
Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 20% and gives your poisons an additional 40% chance to resist dispel effects.

Deadly Throw.name: Deadly Throw
descriptions: Gives your Throw ability a 100% chance to cripple the target, slowing their movement speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

Vigor.name: Vigor
descriptions: Increases your maximum Energy by 10.
Increases your maximum Energy by 20.
Increases your maximum Energy by 30.
Increases your maximum Energy by 40.
Increases your maximum Energy by 50.

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
descriptions:
When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, Mutilate, Hemorrhage or Eviscerate by 100%. Cannot be used in combat.

If used while targeting a dead humanoid, you will acquire their appearance and faction flags. This may not fool some guards.

Nerve Agent.name: Nerve Agent
descriptions: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 10%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 20%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 30%.
Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 40%.

Seal Fate.name: Seal Fate
descriptions: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 20% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 40% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 60% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 80% chance to add an additional combo point.
Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a 100% chance to add an additional combo point.

Mutilate.name: Mutilate
descriptions: Instantly attacks the target with both daggers. The target takes 10% more damage per stack of Deadly Poison. Awards 2 combo points.
